page.title: 02A day in the life of Ellen
page.content: I get up at about 7.15 am and have my breakfast of toast with peanut butter. At 8.30am Granny takes me to the top of our lane to catch the school bus. We arrive at school at 9.00am. We play in the playground until the bell goes at 9.15am. After registration, we do maths and english. We then have a fifteen minute playtime. After that we do more maths, english or topic work. For lunch, we go across the road to the Memorial Hall. I have a packed lunch of sandwiches, crisps, a drink and fruit. We play games in the playground until 1.15 pm. In the afternoon, we do art and craft.We have another playtime at 2.25pm. School ends at 3.45pm. I usually go home on the school bus. On Mondays I go to chess club and the Headmaster takes me home. I get to bed about 10.00 pm.
